title: so does riot just enjoy being hated?
body: the one balanced mage, they decide to just buff her for literally no reason at all to make her stupidly overpowerd

replies.body:
To be fair, there really isn't much that Riot can do without them being hated by somebody.

Just gotta ignore the haters. Good advice against flamers and it works in real life when you're a creator.
Implying lux was balanced to begin with. I would rather lane against pre assassin rework {{champion:7}}  than lane against lux. Thank god she isn't picked much.

Yes, the minions would be clumped up anyways. So you can always just stay behind them, even better, since lux's q has a pretty big hitbox, she can accidentally hit the minion next to it as well.

These buffs might change that you know.

When champions get buffed they fall into the flavor of the week/month column alot. Lux may fall in there too.

Literally nothing changes unless she kills someone with ult. And that makes her up back up sooner. Meh. Everyone acts scandalized for no reason. The buffs are indeed weird, but in no way "stupidly overpowered".
Lux / Balanced. Pick one word, throw the other one out.
